name: Cisco ISE
description: This app implements investigative and containment actions on a Cisco ISE device

ha_device.description: Device IP/Hostname for a High Availability node if available

actions.description: Validate the asset configuration for connectivity. This action logs into the device using a REST API call to check the connection and credentials
List the endpoints configured on the system

mac_address.description: Mac Address to filter on (6 bytes, colon separated)

actions.description: Get information about a specific endpoint
Update information or attributes for a specific endpoint

attribute.description: Attribute to update for the Endpoint

attribute_value.description: Value to put in the attribute for the Endpoint

custom_attribute.description: Custom attribute to update for the Endpoint

custom_attribute_value.description: Value to put in the custom attribute for the Endpoint

actions.description: List the sessions currently available on the Monitoring node

macaddress.description: MAC address of device to terminate sessions of

actions.description: Lists all the resources configured on the system of a particular resource

resource.description: Resource type of the resources to fetch

max_results.description: Total number of observables to return

example_values: Default portal used by sponsors to create and manage accounts for authorized visitors to securely access the network

actions.description: Get the information about resource if resource_id is provided. Fetch the list of resources match with the key-value filter

resource.description: Resource type of the resource to fetch
Resource type of the resource to be deleted
Resource type of the resource to be created

resource_json.description: JSON which contains all values needed to create a resource

resource.description: Resource type of the resource to be created

key.description: Key of resource which needs to be updated

actions.description: Apply policy on selected Ip address or MAC address

ip_mac_address.description: MAC or IP Address of the device

actions.description: Clear policy on selected Ip address or MAC address

ip_mac_address.description: MAC or IP Address of the device

actions.description: Lists all the ANC policies available
